wmndsRadiosProps.name: items
wmndsRadiosProps.description: Required. Array of radio items objects. See items below.

arrayOptions.name: contentText
arrayOptions.description: Required. If contentHTML is set, this is not required. Text to use within each radio item label. If contentHTML is provided, the contentText argument will be ignored.

arrayOptions.name: contentHTML
arrayOptions.description: Required. If contentText is set, this is not required. HTML to use within each radio item label. If contentHTML is provided, the contentText argument will be ignored.

arrayOptions.name: checked
arrayOptions.description: If true, radio will be checked.

arrayOptions.name: name
arrayOptions.description: Specific name for the radio item. If omitted, then component global name string will be applied.

arrayOptions.name: disabled
arrayOptions.description: If true, radio will be disabled.

wmndsRadiosProps.name: question
wmndsRadiosProps.description: Text for the question component relating to the radios.

wmndsRadiosProps.name: hint
wmndsRadiosProps.description: Options for the hint component (e.g. text). See hint options below.

arrayOptions.name: id
arrayOptions.description: Optional id attribute to add to the hint span tag.

arrayOptions.name: contentText
arrayOptions.description: Required. If contentHTML is set, this is not required. Text to use within the hint. If contentHTML is provided, the contentText argument will be ignored.

arrayOptions.name: contentHTML
arrayOptions.description: Required. If contentText is set, this is not required. HTML to use within the hint. If contentHTML is provided, the contentText argument will be ignored.

arrayOptions.name: classes
arrayOptions.description: Classes to add to the hint span tag.

wmndsRadiosProps.name: idPrefix
wmndsRadiosProps.description: String to prefix id for each radio item if no id is specified on each item. If not passed, fall back to using the name option instead.

wmndsRadiosProps.name: inline
wmndsRadiosProps.description: Determines whether to the display the radios horizontally or vertically.

wmndsRadiosProps.name: name
wmndsRadiosProps.description: Required. Name attribute for all radio items.

wmndsRadiosProps.name: classes
wmndsRadiosProps.description: Classes to add to the radios container.

wmndsRadiosProps.name: error
wmndsRadiosProps.description: If true, errorMessage will show. Defaults to false.

wmndsRadiosProps.name: errorMessage
wmndsRadiosProps.description: Options for the error message component. See errorMessage options below.

arrayOptions.name: id
arrayOptions.description: Id attribute to add to the error message span tag.

arrayOptions.name: contentText
arrayOptions.description: Required. Text to use within the error message. If contentHTML is supplied, this is ignored.

arrayOptions.name: contentHTML
arrayOptions.description: Required. HTML to use within the error message
